meanings.sent1: The candle was tallowier than the one we made yesterday.
meanings.sent2: The meat had a tallowier taste than expected.
meanings.sent3: The tallowier soap made bubbles that sparkled like tiny diamonds.
meanings.sent4: The tallowier wax glowed warmly in the dim room.
meanings.sent5: The tallowier texture of the fabric made it feel smooth and luxurious.

meanings.sent1: Her hands felt tallowier after working with the candles all day.
meanings.sent2: The air in the room became tallowier as more candles were lit.
meanings.sent3: The tallowier smell of the room reminded me of grandma's old recipes.
meanings.sent4: The tallowier candles burned longer, casting a soft glow around the room.
meanings.sent5: The tallowier texture of the soap left my skin feeling soft and moisturized.
